platform: VoiceMind AI - Clinical Mental Health Screening

clinical_interpretation.clinical_significance: High accuracy in detecting depression through voice patterns
clinical_interpretation.key_features: Reduced pitch variation, slower speech rate, increased pause frequency
clinical_interpretation.clinical_utility: Excellent screening tool for primary care settings

clinical_interpretation.clinical_significance: Good detection of anxiety-related voice changes
clinical_interpretation.key_features: Increased pitch variability, faster speech rate, voice tremors

clinical_interpretation.clinical_significance: Strong performance in PTSD voice biomarker detection
clinical_interpretation.key_features: Monotone speech, reduced emotional expression, speech avoidance patterns

clinical_interpretation.clinical_significance: Excellent detection of cognitive changes through voice
clinical_interpretation.key_features: Slower processing, increased word-finding difficulties, reduced fluency
clinical_interpretation.clinical_utility: High potential for early cognitive screening
